messages.body: China state media say 4 popular news apps suspended $AAPL #AAPL https://www.marketbeat.com/n/3879039/

links.title: China state media say 4 popular news apps suspended
links.description: Posted on Monday, April 9th, 2018 By The Associated Press BEIJING (AP) - Chinese state media say four popular news apps have been temporarily removed from the Android store following an order from regulators to tighten control over the spread of information.
